name: Scary Stories RPG
description:
This is for a Halloween game jam that I am most eager to join!

The game is loosely based off Alvin  Schwarts' Book series " Scary stories to tell in the dark"

But I made it  a little more family friendly, you can save the unfortunate victims before a dark fate falls upon them!

You are also playing Aqua's Brother, Oliver!

I would like to thank lil' Job, Ts-Time, and all the other people who helped me  make this game possible.  and there is some Easter eggs if you are interested in looking for them!
